data.title: Official Roberts Radio Online Shop
data.meta_description: British engineered with vibrant design; we've been perfecting our craft for nearly 90 years to add life to your home. Explore the Roberts Radio shop now.
data.text:
August Bank Holiday Offers

Enjoy unbeatable deals and premium sound quality for a perfect long weekend.

Latest Offers

Check out our sizzling bank holiday deals and enjoy top-quality sound all season long!

Iconic Vintage Radio Design

Revival iStream 3L

Our original and iconic 1950s inspired smart radio and speaker now comes with a more powerful processor, speedier start-up and functions that are easier to use than ever. Welcome to an enhanced listening experience in a retro design you already know and love.

Your Ultimate Festival Companion

Gear up for festival season with the new Revival Petite 2. Perfect sound, anywhere you go!

Outdoor Radios and Speakers

Elevate Your Outdoor Adventures with Premium Sound

Relax in your garden or on the go with our Outdoor Radios - designed to last and perform even when outside the comfort of home.

Latest Releases

Sounds like the perfect time to treat yourself...

Crystal-clear quality

DAB Radios

Discover the future of radio with our Digital Audio Broadcast (DAB) Radios. Experience crystal-clear sound and a wider selection of your favorite stations, including exclusive digital-only channels. Browse our DAB/DAB+ collection – whether you need a portable option or a stylish addition to your kitchen or living room, we have the perfect radio for you.

Decades of Distinct Design

Rambler Radio Range

The original Roberts Rambler dates back to the early 1970s and has been loved ever since. The modern Rambler range boasts the charm of the original, packed with the high-performance sound and new-age features.

Iconic Design

Revival Radio Range

The instantly iconic Roberts Revival range combines retro design with superior sound performance. With ten colours and five models to choose from, there's a Revival to suit your style and fit your home.

Clock Radios

On time and in tune

From digital to analogue, DAB+ to FM, big or small – find the bedside companion with all the features you need.

British Audio Designed to Excite the Senses.

Roberts is much more than a radio or a speaker. It’s something to take pride of place in the home. To be seen, touched, and heard. A way to create an experience out of everyday listening.

Sign up to receive our newsletters

Keep up to date with the latest Roberts products, news and offers straight to your inbox.

Email *
